name: s3-image-upload
description: This repository provides a solution for uploading images to AWS S3 and automatically triggering a Lambda function upon successful upload. The code included in this repository allows you to seamlessly store image files in an S3 bucket and efficiently handle the triggered events with a Lambda function. It serves as a practical starting point for implementing image upload functionality with event-driven processing using AWS services.
author: Nzhdeh Barseghyan
